title: Life in the Jamestown Colony - context

content.prompt: Life in the Jamestown Colony in the early seventeenth century was difficult for all of the following reasons EXCEPT:

choices.label: The colonists suffered from malnutrition due to a poor diet.
Some colonists believed that farming was beneath their social standing.
None of the expected gold or silver was found.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
